amendment.description: An amendment to change the definition in the bill of those agency actions that would require a regulatory impact analysis. The bill would require such analysis for proposed regulations that would cause a "major increase in costs or prices for consumers, individual industries, Federal, State, or local government agencies..." The amendment would require the analysis for regulations that would cause an increase of 5% in costs or prices.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Volkmer amendment was withdrawn.
